mariana_snailfish.name: Mariana Snailfish
mariana_snailfish.fact: The Mariana snailfish lives at depths of up to 8,000 meters and is one of the deepest-living fish ever found!

giant_tube_worm.name: Giant Tube Worm
giant_tube_worm.fact: Giant tube worms can grow up to 2.4 meters long and have no mouth or stomach - they absorb nutrients through their skin!

comb_jelly.name: Comb Jelly
comb_jelly.fact: Comb jellies have been swimming in oceans for over 500 million years, making them one of the oldest animal groups!

deep_sea_cucumber.name: Deep Sea Cucumber
deep_sea_cucumber.fact: Deep sea cucumbers can expel part of their internal organs to distract predators, then regrow them later!

zombie_worm.name: Zombie Worm
zombie_worm.fact: Zombie worms eat whale bones by drilling into them with acid!

ping_pong_tree_sponge.name: Ping Pong Tree Sponge
ping_pong_tree_sponge.fact: This sponge has branches that look like ping pong paddles and can glow in the dark!

tripod_fish.name: Tripod Fish
tripod_fish.fact: Tripod fish stand on three fin rays like a tripod to wait for food to drift by!

dumbo_octopus.name: Dumbo Octopus
dumbo_octopus.fact: The dumbo octopus got its name from ear-like fins that look like Dumbo's ears!

faceless_cusk.name: Faceless Cusk
faceless_cusk.fact: The faceless cusk has no visible eyes and its mouth is hidden underneath its head!

abyssal_spiderfish.name: Abyssal Spiderfish
abyssal_spiderfish.fact: Spiderfish have extra-long fins that let them walk on the ocean floor like a spider!

sea_pig.name: Sea Pig
sea_pig.fact: Sea pigs are actually a type of sea cucumber that walks on the ocean floor with tube feet!

ghost_shark.name: Ghost Shark
ghost_shark.fact: Ghost sharks are ancient relatives of sharks that have been around for 400 million years!

deep_sea_amphipod.name: Deep Sea Amphipod
deep_sea_amphipod.fact: Deep sea amphipods can grow up to 34 centimeters long - much bigger than their shallow-water relatives!

glass_sponge.name: Glass Sponge
glass_sponge.fact: Glass sponges have skeletons made of silica, the same material glass is made from!

grenadier_fish.name: Grenadier Fish
grenadier_fish.fact: Grenadier fish have huge heads and long, tapering bodies that look like a grenade!

cusk_eel.name: Cusk Eel
cusk_eel.fact: Despite their name, cusk eels are actually fish, not eels!

snipe_eel.name: Snipe Eel
snipe_eel.fact: Snipe eels have jaws that curve away from each other, making them look like a pair of scissors!

sea_angel.name: Sea Angel
sea_angel.fact: Sea angels are actually swimming sea slugs that flutter through the water like angels!

deep_sea_jellyfish.name: Deep Sea Jellyfish
deep_sea_jellyfish.fact: Some deep sea jellyfish can glow with rainbow colors to attract prey!

basket_star.name: Basket Star
basket_star.fact: Basket stars are starfish with arms that branch out like a basket to catch floating food!

brisingid_starfish.name: Brisingid Starfish
brisingid_starfish.fact: Brisingid starfish have up to 20 long arms that they use like fishing nets!

sea_pen.name: Sea Pen
sea_pen.fact: Sea pens are colonies of tiny animals that work together like a single organism!

acorn_worm.name: Acorn Worm
acorn_worm.fact: Acorn worms are close relatives of vertebrates and may show how our ancestors evolved!

monophore.name: Monophore
monophore.fact: Monophores are strange deep sea creatures that filter food from the water using special tentacles!

siphonophore.name: Siphonophore
siphonophore.fact: The siphonophore can grow up to 50 meters long, making it longer than a blue whale!

black_swallower.name: Black Swallower
black_swallower.fact: The black swallower can eat prey 10 times its own size by unhinging its jaw!

lizardfish.name: Lizardfish
lizardfish.fact: Lizardfish have needle-like teeth and can change color to match their surroundings!

spookfish.name: Spookfish
spookfish.fact: Spookfish have a mirror-like lens in their eyes that helps them see in the dark!

anglerfish.name: Anglerfish
anglerfish.fact: Female anglerfish have a glowing lure that attracts prey in the dark depths!

vampire_squid.name: Vampire Squid
vampire_squid.fact: Despite its scary name, the vampire squid eats only tiny particles called marine snow!

giant_squid.name: Giant Squid
giant_squid.fact: Giant squids have eyes the size of dinner plates - the largest eyes in the animal kingdom!

gulper_eel.name: Gulper Eel
gulper_eel.fact: The gulper eel has a huge mouth that can swallow prey much larger than itself!

goblin_shark.name: Goblin Shark
goblin_shark.fact: The goblin shark has a jaw that shoots out like a spring to catch prey!

blobfish.name: Blobfish
blobfish.fact: Blobfish look normal in their deep-sea home but look blobby when brought to the surface!

lanternfish.name: Lanternfish
lanternfish.fact: Lanternfish have light-producing organs called photophores that glow in the dark!

hatchetfish.name: Hatchetfish
hatchetfish.fact: Hatchetfish have bodies shaped like hatchets and can produce light to hide their shadow!

viperfish.name: Viperfish
viperfish.fact: Viperfish have huge fangs that are so long they can't fit inside their mouth!

dragonfish.name: Dragonfish
dragonfish.fact: Dragonfish have a red light that only they can see, helping them hunt without being detected!

fangtooth.name: Fangtooth
fangtooth.fact: Fangtooth fish have the largest teeth relative to body size of any fish!

frilled_shark.name: Frilled Shark
frilled_shark.fact: The frilled shark is called a 'living fossil' because it has changed little in 80 million years!

coffinfish.name: Coffinfish
coffinfish.fact: Coffinfish can puff up like a balloon and have a lure on their head like an anglerfish!

barreleye.name: Barreleye
barreleye.fact: The barreleye has a transparent head so it can look up through its skull!

cookiecutter_shark.name: Cookiecutter Shark
cookiecutter_shark.fact: Cookiecutter sharks bite circular holes in their prey, like a cookie cutter!

oarfish.name: Oarfish
oarfish.fact: Oarfish can grow up to 11 meters long and are probably the source of sea serpent legends!

big_red_jelly.name: Big Red Jelly
big_red_jelly.fact: The big red jelly can grow up to 1 meter across and lives at depths of 650 meters!

colossal_squid.name: Colossal Squid
colossal_squid.fact: The colossal squid is heavier than a giant squid and has hooks instead of suckers!

six_gill_shark.name: Six-Gill Shark
six_gill_shark.fact: Six-gill sharks are ancient predators that have been around since before the dinosaurs!

wolffish.name: Wolffish
wolffish.fact: Wolffish have powerful jaws that can crush crabs, sea urchins, and clams!

chimaera.name: Chimaera
chimaera.fact: Chimaeras are related to sharks and have a single gill opening on each side!

stoplight_loosejaw.name: Stoplight Loosejaw
stoplight_loosejaw.fact: This fish has a lower jaw that can detach and swing forward to catch prey!

flashlight_fish.name: Flashlight Fish
flashlight_fish.fact: Flashlight fish have organs under their eyes that produce bright light!

japanese_spider_crab.name: Japanese Spider Crab
japanese_spider_crab.fact: Japanese spider crabs can have a leg span of up to 3.7 meters!

nautilus.name: Nautilus
nautilus.fact: The nautilus has remained unchanged for 500 million years and uses jet propulsion to move!

sperm_whale.name: Sperm Whale
sperm_whale.fact: Sperm whales can dive to 3,000 meters and hold their breath for 90 minutes!

beaked_whale.name: Beaked Whale
beaked_whale.fact: Beaked whales can dive deeper than any other marine mammal - up to 2,992 meters!

elephant_seal.name: Elephant Seal
elephant_seal.fact: Elephant seals can dive to 1,500 meters and hold their breath for two hours!

clownfish.name: Clownfish
clownfish.fact: Clownfish are all born male and the largest one will turn into a female!

blue_tang.name: Blue Tang
blue_tang.fact: Blue tangs can change color based on their mood - they get darker at night!

parrotfish.name: Parrotfish
parrotfish.fact: Parrotfish sleep in a bubble of their own mucus to hide their scent from predators!

lionfish.name: Lionfish
lionfish.fact: Lionfish have venomous spines that can cause painful stings to humans!

seahorse.name: Seahorse
seahorse.fact: Seahorses are the only animals where males get pregnant and give birth!

moray_eel.name: Moray Eel
moray_eel.fact: Moray eels have a second set of jaws in their throat that grab prey and pull it down!

pufferfish.name: Pufferfish
pufferfish.fact: Pufferfish contain a poison 1,200 times more deadly than cyanide!

butterflyfish.name: Butterflyfish
butterflyfish.fact: Butterflyfish mate for life and can be seen swimming in pairs!

angelfish.name: Angelfish
angelfish.fact: Young angelfish have different colors and patterns than adult angelfish!

sea_turtle.name: Sea Turtle
sea_turtle.fact: Sea turtles can live over 100 years and return to the same beach where they were born to lay eggs!

reef_shark.name: Reef Shark
reef_shark.fact: Reef sharks can rest while swimming by using their tails to push water over their gills!

manta_ray.name: Manta Ray
manta_ray.fact: Manta rays have the largest brain of any fish and can recognize themselves in mirrors!

cuttlefish.name: Cuttlefish
cuttlefish.fact: Cuttlefish can change color and pattern in less than a second to communicate or hide!

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.fact: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood!

giant_clam.name: Giant Clam
giant_clam.fact: Giant clams can live over 100 years and can weigh up to 200 kilograms!

boxfish.name: Boxfish
boxfish.fact: Boxfish release a toxin when stressed that can kill other fish nearby!

triggerfish.name: Triggerfish
triggerfish.fact: Triggerfish can swim backward by using their second dorsal fin!

sea_anemone.name: Sea Anemone
sea_anemone.fact: Sea anemones can live for 50 years and some species can eat small fish!

mandarinfish.name: Mandarinfish
mandarinfish.fact: Mandarinfish are covered in a toxic mucus that protects them from predators!

moorish_idol.name: Moorish Idol
moorish_idol.fact: Moorish idols can change color when they sleep or get excited!

napoleon_wrasse.name: Napoleon Wrasse
napoleon_wrasse.fact: Napoleon wrasse can live over 30 years and are one of the largest reef fish!

cleaner_shrimp.name: Cleaner Shrimp
cleaner_shrimp.fact: Cleaner shrimp set up cleaning stations where fish line up to have parasites removed!

stonefish.name: Stonefish
stonefish.fact: The stonefish is the most venomous fish in the world and can be fatal to humans!

barracuda.name: Barracuda
barracuda.fact: Barracudas can swim up to 60 km/h and have been known to leap out of the water!

trumpetfish.name: Trumpetfish
trumpetfish.fact: Trumpetfish often swim vertically to blend in with sea fans and corals!

nudibranch.name: Nudibranch
nudibranch.fact: Nudibranchs are sea slugs that come in thousands of bright colors and patterns!

sea_fan.name: Sea Fan
sea_fan.fact: Sea fans are actually colonies of tiny animals that create a fan-shaped structure!

brain_coral.name: Brain Coral
brain_coral.fact: Brain corals can live for over 900 years and grow very slowly!

bottlenose_dolphin.name: Bottlenose Dolphin
bottlenose_dolphin.fact: Dolphins have names for each other - they use unique whistle signatures to identify friends!

sea_otter.name: Sea Otter
sea_otter.fact: Sea otters have the densest fur of any animal with up to 1 million hairs per square inch!

manatee.name: Manatee
manatee.fact: Manatees are known as sea cows and eat up to 10% of their body weight daily!

stingray.name: Stingray
stingray.fact: Stingrays have sensors on their faces that can detect the electrical fields of prey!

starfish.name: Starfish
starfish.fact: Starfish can regrow lost arms and some can even grow a whole new body from just one arm!

hermit_crab.name: Hermit Crab
hermit_crab.fact: Hermit crabs carry their homes on their backs and must find bigger shells as they grow!

lobster.name: Lobster
lobster.fact: Lobsters can live over 100 years and don't show signs of aging!

sea_urchin.name: Sea Urchin
sea_urchin.fact: Sea urchins have teeth that grow continuously and are made of the hardest material in nature!

sand_dollar.name: Sand Dollar
sand_dollar.fact: Sand dollars are flattened sea urchins that use tiny spines to move and bury themselves!

pelican.name: Pelican
pelican.fact: Pelicans can hold up to 11 liters of water in their throat pouch!

seagull.name: Seagull
seagull.fact: Seagulls can drink salt water because they have special glands that remove the salt!

horseshoe_crab.name: Horseshoe Crab
horseshoe_crab.fact: Horseshoe crabs have been around for 450 million years, longer than dinosaurs!

fiddler_crab.name: Fiddler Crab
fiddler_crab.fact: Male fiddler crabs have one giant claw they wave to attract females!

flounder.name: Flounder
flounder.fact: Flounder are born with eyes on both sides of their head, but one eye moves to the top as they grow!

barnacle.name: Barnacle
barnacle.fact: Barnacles stand on their heads and kick food into their mouth with their feet!

jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
jellyfish.fact: Jellyfish are 95% water and have been around for over 500 million years!

sea_lion.name: Sea Lion
sea_lion.fact: Sea lions can swim up to 40 km/h and can hold their breath for 20 minutes!

harbor_seal.name: Harbor Seal
harbor_seal.fact: Harbor seals can sleep underwater and surface automatically to breathe without waking up!

great_white_shark.name: Great White Shark
great_white_shark.fact: Great white sharks can detect one drop of blood in 100 liters of water!

hammerhead_shark.name: Hammerhead Shark
hammerhead_shark.fact: Hammerhead sharks have eyes on the sides of their head, giving them 360-degree vision!

tiger_shark.name: Tiger Shark
tiger_shark.fact: Tiger sharks will eat anything - tires, license plates, and even suits of armor have been found in their stomachs!

sea_sponge.name: Sea Sponge
sea_sponge.fact: Sea sponges can filter their entire body volume in less than a minute!

scallop.name: Scallop
scallop.fact: Scallops have dozens of eyes and can swim by clapping their shells together!

oyster.name: Oyster
oyster.fact: Oysters can change their sex multiple times during their lifetime!

mussel.name: Mussel
mussel.fact: Mussels produce byssal threads, often called 'beards', that are as strong as steel!

conch_snail.name: Conch Snail
conch_snail.fact: Conch snails have eyes on stalks and can jump by using their foot like a spring!

krill.name: Krill
krill.fact: Krill are the most abundant animal species on Earth with a total weight of 500 million tons!

plankton.name: Plankton
plankton.fact: Plankton produce half of the oxygen we breathe!

cow.name: Cow
cow.fact: Cows have best friends and get stressed when they're separated!

pig.name: Pig
pig.fact: Pigs are smarter than dogs and can learn to play video games!

sheep.name: Sheep
sheep.fact: Sheep can recognize up to 50 different human faces and remember them for years!

goat.name: Goat
goat.fact: Goats have accents - their bleats change depending on their social group!

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.fact: Chickens have over 30 different vocalizations and can dream!

rooster.name: Rooster
rooster.fact: Roosters can tell time and often crow just before sunrise!

duck.name: Duck
duck.fact: Ducklings will follow the first moving thing they see - even if it's not their mother!

goose.name: Goose
goose.fact: Geese mate for life and mourn their dead partners!

turkey.name: Turkey
turkey.fact: Wild turkeys can fly up to 88 km/h but domestic turkeys can't fly!

horse.name: Horse
horse.fact: Horses can sleep standing up using a system of tendons and ligaments!

donkey.name: Donkey
donkey.fact: Donkeys have incredible memories and can recognize places they haven't seen in 25 years!

pony.name: Pony
pony.fact: Ponies are stronger than horses relative to their size!

llama.name: Llama
llama.fact: Llamas can carry up to 30% of their body weight and will spit when angry!

alpaca.name: Alpaca
alpaca.fact: Alpaca fiber is fire-resistant and comes in 22 natural colors!

border_collie.name: Border Collie
border_collie.fact: Border collies are the smartest dog breed and can learn over 1,000 words!

golden_retriever.name: Golden Retriever
golden_retriever.fact: Golden retrievers have 'soft mouths' and can carry eggs without breaking them!

tabby_cat.name: Tabby Cat
tabby_cat.fact: Tabby cats have an M pattern on their forehead that's believed to be from Mohammed's blessing!

siamese_cat.name: Siamese Cat
siamese_cat.fact: Siamese cats are born white and develop their points as they get older!

goldfish.name: Goldfish
goldfish.fact: Goldfish can recognize faces and can be trained to push levers for food!

hamster.name: Hamster
hamster.fact: Hamsters have pouches in their cheeks that can stretch to their shoulders!

guinea_pig.name: Guinea Pig
guinea_pig.fact: Guinea pigs can't make their own vitamin C and must get it from food!

rabbit.name: Rabbit
rabbit.fact: Rabbits can jump nearly 1 meter high and have 360-degree vision!

ferret.name: Ferret
ferret.fact: Ferrets sleep up to 18 hours a day and are most active at dawn and dusk!

parakeet.name: Parakeet
parakeet.fact: Parakeets can learn over 100 words and live up to 20 years!

cockatiel.name: Cockatiel
cockatiel.fact: Male cockatiels are better at talking and females are better at whistling!

turtle.name: Turtle
turtle.fact: Turtles can breathe through their butt when underwater!

pot_bellied_pig.name: Pot-bellied Pig
pot_bellied_pig.fact: Pot-bellied pigs can learn to use a litter box and respond to their name!

mule.name: Mule
mule.fact: Mules are smarter than horses and have better endurance than donkeys!

brown_bear.name: Brown Bear
brown_bear.fact: Brown bears can run up to 48 km/h and eat up to 40 kg of food per day!

black_bear.name: Black Bear
black_bear.fact: Black bears can climb trees even as adults and are excellent swimmers!

moose.name: Moose
moose.fact: Moose antlers can grow up to 2 meters wide and fall off every winter!

elk.name: Elk
elk.fact: Elk can jump 2.4 meters high and their antlers can grow 2.5 cm per day!

white_tailed_deer.name: White-Tailed Deer
white_tailed_deer.fact: White-tailed deer can run up to 48 km/h and jump 3 meters high!

red_fox.name: Red Fox
red_fox.fact: Red foxes have 28 different calls and can hear a watch ticking from 40 meters away!

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.fact: Wolves can run for hours at 8 km/h and have 200 million scent cells!

coyote.name: Coyote
coyote.fact: Coyotes can mate with dogs and wolves and can jump 4 meters high!

bobcat.name: Bobcat
bobcat.fact: Bobcats can leap 3 meters to catch prey and have excellent night vision!

lynx.name: Lynx
lynx.fact: Lynx have huge paws that work like snowshoes to help them walk on snow!

squirrel.name: Squirrel
squirrel.fact: Squirrels can find buried nuts under a foot of snow using their sense of smell!

chipmunk.name: Chipmunk
chipmunk.fact: Chipmunks can carry food in their cheek pouches and store up to 8 kg of nuts for winter!

beaver.name: Beaver
beaver.fact: Beavers can hold their breath for 15 minutes and their teeth never stop growing!

river_otter.name: River Otter
river_otter.fact: River otters have waterproof fur and can close their nostrils and ears underwater!

porcupine.name: Porcupine
porcupine.fact: Porcupines have up to 30,000 quills that they can shoot out when threatened!

skunk.name: Skunk
skunk.fact: Skunk spray can be detected up to 3.5 km away and can cause temporary blindness!

badger.name: Badger
badger.fact: Badgers can dig through concrete and their jaws can lock onto prey with incredible force!

woodpecker.name: Woodpecker
woodpecker.fact: Woodpeckers can peck 20 times per second and have shock-absorbing skulls!

blue_jay.name: Blue Jay
blue_jay.fact: Blue jays can mimic hawk calls to scare other birds away from food!

cardinal.name: Cardinal
cardinal.fact: Cardinals don't molt their feathers so they stay bright red all year!

eagle.name: Eagle
eagle.fact: Eagles can see 4-7 times better than humans and can spot a rabbit from 3 km away!

hawk.name: Hawk
hawk.fact: Hawks can see in ultraviolet and track prey by following urine trails!

falcon.name: Falcon
falcon.fact: Peregrine falcons are the fastest animals, diving at over 320 km/h!

wild_boar.name: Wild Boar
wild_boar.fact: Wild boars have tough skin that can stop arrows and they're excellent swimmers!

hedgehog.name: Hedgehog
hedgehog.fact: Hedgehogs are immune to snake venom and can eat poisonous snakes!

mole.name: Mole
mole.fact: Moles can dig 15 meters of tunnel per hour and have a special thumb for digging!

salamander.name: Salamander
salamander.fact: Some salamanders can regrow entire limbs, including bones, muscles, and nerves!

turkey_vulture.name: Turkey Vulture
turkey_vulture.fact: Turkey vultures can eat diseased animals without getting sick and use vomit as defense!

bengal_tiger.name: Bengal Tiger
bengal_tiger.fact: Tigers have stripes on their skin as well as their fur - no two tigers have the same pattern!

jaguar.name: Jaguar
jaguar.fact: Jaguars have the strongest bite of all big cats and can crush turtle shells!

leopard.name: Leopard
leopard.fact: Leopards can carry prey 3 times their own weight up trees!

gorilla.name: Gorilla
gorilla.fact: Gorillas can learn sign language and have unique fingerprints like humans!

chimpanzee.name: Chimpanzee
chimpanzee.fact: Chimpanzees use tools, teach their young, and have been seen using medicine!

orangutan.name: Orangutan
orangutan.fact: Orangutans share 97% of DNA with humans and build nests in trees every night!

howler_monkey.name: Howler Monkey
howler_monkey.fact: Howler monkeys are the loudest land animals - their calls can be heard 5 km away!

spider_monkey.name: Spider Monkey
spider_monkey.fact: Spider monkeys have a prehensile tail that works like a fifth arm!

capuchin_monkey.name: Capuchin Monkey
capuchin_monkey.fact: Capuchin monkeys use tools to crack nuts and even use medicinal plants!

lemur.name: Lemur
lemur.fact: Lemurs have long tails for balance and communicate with scent markings!

sloth.name: Sloth
sloth.fact: Sloths are so slow that algae grows on their fur, helping them blend in!

anteater.name: Anteater
anteater.fact: Anteaters can eat 35,000 ants per day and have a 60 cm long tongue!

armadillo.name: Armadillo
armadillo.fact: Armadillos can jump 1 meter high when startled and always have identical quadruplets!

tapir.name: Tapir
tapir.fact: Tapirs are related to horses and rhinos and can use their nose as a snorkel!

toucan.name: Toucan
toucan.fact: A toucan's bill is one-third of its body length but is so light it can't affect balance!

macaw.name: Macaw
macaw.fact: Macaws can live over 80 years and mate for life!

parrot.name: Parrot
parrot.fact: Some parrots can live over 100 years and learn over 100 words!

hummingbird.name: Hummingbird
hummingbird.fact: Hummingbirds beat their wings 80 times per second and are the only birds that can fly backward!

green_iguana.name: Green Iguana
green_iguana.fact: Iguanas can hold their breath for 30 minutes and have a third eye on top of their head!

chameleon.name: Chameleon
chameleon.fact: Chameleons change color based on mood and temperature, not just camouflage!

boa_constrictor.name: Boa Constrictor
boa_constrictor.fact: Boa constrictors have heat-sensing pits and can swallow prey larger than their head!

python.name: Python
python.fact: Pythons can go a year without eating and have flexible jaws that unhinge to swallow large prey!

anaconda.name: Anaconda
anaconda.fact: Anacondas give birth to live young and can stay underwater for 10 minutes!

poison_dart_frog.name: Poison Dart Frog
poison_dart_frog.fact: One golden poison dart frog has enough poison to kill 10 humans!

red_eyed_tree_frog.name: Red-Eyed Tree Frog
red_eyed_tree_frog.fact: Red-eyed tree frogs flash their bright colors to startle predators, then escape!

tarantula.name: Tarantula
tarantula.fact: Tarantulas can regenerate lost legs and some species can live 30 years!

leafcutter_ant.name: Leafcutter Ant
leafcutter_ant.fact: Leafcutter ants don't eat leaves - they use them to grow fungus that they eat!

okapi.name: Okapi
okapi.fact: Okapis are the only living relatives of giraffes and have zebra-striped legs!

barn_owl.name: Barn Owl
barn_owl.fact: Barn owls have asymmetrical ears that help them pinpoint sounds in complete darkness!

great_horned_owl.name: Great Horned Owl
great_horned_owl.fact: Great horned owls can't move their eyes, so they can turn their heads 270 degrees!

fruit_bat.name: Fruit Bat
fruit_bat.fact: Fruit bats are essential pollinators for over 300 plant species!

vampire_bat.name: Vampire Bat
vampire_bat.fact: Vampire bats can walk, run, and jump and share blood with other bats who couldn't find food!

raccoon.name: Raccoon
raccoon.fact: Raccoons have 'hands' with five fingers and can remember solutions to tasks for 3 years!

opossum.name: Opossum
opossum.fact: Opossums play dead when threatened and can have up to 20 babies at once!

aye_aye.name: Aye-Aye
aye_aye.fact: Aye-ayes have a long middle finger they use to tap on wood and find insects!

tarsier.name: Tarsier
tarsier.fact: Tarsiers have the largest eyes relative to body size of any mammal!

bush_baby.name: Bush Baby
bush_baby.fact: Bush babies can leap 2.5 meters and have huge ears that help them hunt insects!

sugar_glider.name: Sugar Glider
sugar_glider.fact: Sugar gliders can glide up to 45 meters using a membrane between their legs!

kinkajou.name: Kinkajou
kinkajou.fact: Kinkajous have a 5-inch long tongue they use to reach nectar in flowers!

fennec_fox.name: Fennec Fox
fennec_fox.fact: Fennec foxes have huge ears that help them hear prey underground and release heat!

hyena.name: Hyena
hyena.fact: Hyenas are more closely related to cats than dogs and can digest bones completely!

aardvark.name: Aardvark
aardvark.fact: Aardvarks can dig 1 meter in 5 minutes and eat 50,000 termites per night!

pangolin.name: Pangolin
pangolin.fact: Pangolins are the only mammals covered in scales and can roll into a ball for protection!

tasmanian_devil.name: Tasmanian Devil
tasmanian_devil.fact: Tasmanian devils have the strongest bite relative to body size of any mammal!

wombat.name: Wombat
wombat.fact: Wombats have cube-shaped poop that doesn't roll away and they use it to mark territory!

koala.name: Koala
koala.fact: Koalas sleep 22 hours a day and have fingerprints almost identical to humans!

scorpion.name: Scorpion
scorpion.fact: Scorpions glow under UV light and can survive a year without food!

firefly.name: Firefly
firefly.fact: Fireflies flash in patterns to attract mates and some synchronize their flashes!

moth.name: Moth
moth.fact: Moths navigate by the moon and some can fly up to 60 km/h!

gecko.name: Gecko
gecko.fact: Geckos can walk on walls using microscopic hairs that create molecular attraction!

cacomistle.name: Cacomistle
cacomistle.fact: Cacomistles are related to raccoons and have rings on their tails like raccoons!

civet.name: Civet
civet.fact: Civets produce musk used in perfumes and some coffee beans pass through them!

genet.name: Genet
genet.fact: Genets can stand on their hind legs to look around and have retractable claws like cats!

mouse.name: Mouse
mouse.fact: Mice can squeeze through holes as small as a pencil and have ultrasonic hearing!

rat.name: Rat
rat.fact: Rats are excellent swimmers, can hold their breath for 3 minutes, and laugh when tickled!

jerboa.name: Jerboa
jerboa.fact: Jerboas can hop 3 meters high and use their tail for balance!

polar_bear.name: Polar Bear
polar_bear.fact: Polar bears have black skin under their white fur to absorb heat!

arctic_fox.name: Arctic Fox
arctic_fox.fact: Arctic foxes change color - white in winter, brown or gray in summer!

arctic_wolf.name: Arctic Wolf
arctic_wolf.fact: Arctic wolves can survive temperatures of -70C and have two layers of fur!

arctic_hare.name: Arctic Hare
arctic_hare.fact: Arctic hares can run up to 60 km/h and change from brown to white for winter!

walrus.name: Walrus
walrus.fact: Walruses use their tusks to haul out of water and can weigh up to 1,500 kg!

narwhal.name: Narwhal
narwhal.fact: Narwhals have a 3-meter long tooth that looks like a unicorn horn!

beluga_whale.name: Beluga Whale
beluga_whale.fact: Beluga whales can change the shape of their forehead and are called 'canaries of the sea' for their songs!

bowhead_whale.name: Bowhead Whale
bowhead_whale.fact: Bowhead whales can live over 200 years, making them the longest-living mammals!

orca.name: Orca
orca.fact: Orcas are actually dolphins and each pod has its own unique dialect!

harp_seal.name: Harp Seal
harp_seal.fact: Harp seal pups can swim within minutes of birth and have pure white fur for the first few weeks!

leopard_seal.name: Leopard Seal
leopard_seal.fact: Leopard seals are the only seals that eat warm-blooded prey like penguins!

weddell_seal.name: Weddell Seal
weddell_seal.fact: Weddell seals can dive to 600 meters and use their teeth to chew holes in ice to breathe!

emperor_penguin.name: Emperor Penguin
emperor_penguin.fact: Emperor penguins can dive to 500 meters and males incubate eggs on their feet for 64 days!

adelie_penguin.name: Adelie Penguin
adelie_penguin.fact: Adelie penguins use pebbles to build nests and will steal them from each other!

rockhopper_penguin.name: Rockhopper Penguin
rockhopper_penguin.fact: Rockhopper penguins have spiky feathers on their heads and can jump 2.5 meters high!

puffin.name: Puffin
puffin.fact: Puffins can hold up to 10 fish in their beak at once!

snowy_owl.name: Snowy Owl
snowy_owl.fact: Snowy owls have feathers on their feet like snowshoes and hunt 24 hours a day in summer!

musk_ox.name: Musk Ox
musk_ox.fact: Musk oxen have underwool that's 8 times warmer than sheep's wool!

reindeer.name: Reindeer
reindeer.fact: Reindeer are the only deer species where both males and females have antlers!

caribou.name: Caribou
caribou.fact: Caribou can travel 5,000 km per year - the longest land migration of any animal!

lemming.name: Lemming
lemming.fact: Contrary to myth, lemmings don't commit mass suicide - they migrate when populations get too high!

ptarmigan.name: Ptarmigan
ptarmigan.fact: Ptarmigans have feathered feet that act like snowshoes and change color with seasons!

wolverine.name: Wolverine
wolverine.fact: Wolverines can take down prey 10 times their size and have teeth strong enough to break bones!

stoat.name: Stoat
stoat.fact: Stoats turn white in winter and perform hypnotic dances to mesmerize rabbits!

ermine.name: Ermine
ermine.fact: Ermines are stoats in their white winter coat and were once used to make royal robes!

snow_goose.name: Snow Goose
snow_goose.fact: Snow geese fly in formation that saves 70% energy for birds behind the leader!

albatross.name: Albatross
albatross.fact: Albatrosses can fly for hours without flapping their wings and can sleep while flying!

krill_antarctic.name: Krill (Antarctic)
krill_antarctic.fact: Antarctic krill can live for 10 years and use their bodies as a solar panel by eating ice algae!
